sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèxiē píngguǒ hěn xīnxiān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ces pommes sont très fraîches.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: These apples are very fresh.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zǎoshang chī le liǎng piàn miànbāo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai mangé deux tranches de pain ce matin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I ate two slices of bread this morning.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gàosù wǒ jiànmiàn de dìdiǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: S'il te plaît, dis-moi le lieu de rendez-vous.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please tell me the meeting location.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zài wǎngshàng mǎi le yī běn shū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai acheté un livre en ligne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I bought a book online.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 有的人喜欢咖啡，有的人喜欢茶。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yǒude rén xǐhuan kāfēi, yǒude rén xǐhuan chá.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Certaines personnes aiment le café, d'autres préfèrent le thé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Some people like coffee, some people like tea.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Huǒchēzhàn lí zhèlǐ hěn jìn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La gare est très proche d'ici.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The train station is very close to here.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège duōshao qián?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Combien coûte ceci ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: How much is this?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān wǎnshang wǒ xiǎng kàn diànyǐng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce soir, je veux regarder un film.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to watch a movie tonight.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā dédào le lǎoshī de biǎoyáng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a reçu les félicitations du professeur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He received praise from the teacher.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我每天早上喝一杯牛奶。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ měitiān zǎoshang hē yī bēi niúnǎi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je bois un verre de lait chaque matin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I drink a glass of milk every morning.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ jīntiān yào qù yīyuàn kànbìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je dois aller à l'hôpital voir un médecin aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I need to go to the hospital to see a doctor today.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen bān yǒu shí gè xuésheng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Notre classe a dix étudiants.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Our class has ten students.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ měitiān zǎoshang liù diǎn qǐchuáng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je me lève à six heures chaque matin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I get up at six o'clock every morning.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yī gè xīngqī yǒu qī tiān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Une semaine a sept jours.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: A week has seven days.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuan dú zhōngwén shū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime lire des livres en chinois.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like to read Chinese books.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 白天我工作，晚上我学习。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Báitiān wǒ gōngzuò, wǎnshang wǒ xuéxí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je travaille pendant la journée et j'étudie le soir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I work during the day and study at night.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ yǒu jǐ gè xiōngdì jiěmèi?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Combien de frères et sœurs as-tu ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: How many siblings do you have?

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我的爷爷很老了，今年八十岁。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ de yéye hěn lǎo le, jīnnián bāshí suì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mon grand-père est très âgé, il a quatre-vingts ans cette année.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My grandfather is very old, he is eighty years old this year.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ wǎnshang bā diǎn shuìjiào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je me couche à huit heures du soir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I go to bed at eight o'clock at night.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ bù xǐhuan chī là de dōngxi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je n'aime pas manger des choses épicées.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I don't like to eat spicy food.
